bug.author: shawncal
bug.description:
Describe the bug When cross-compiling for ARM32v7 following the instructions on build.md, I encounter this blocking warning-treated-as-error (see below). The workaround is to open "tools/ci_build/build.py", search for onnxruntime_DEV_MODE, remove the whole line. Recommendation:
make onnxruntime_DEV_MODE an option flag for build.py (i.e. "--dev_mode")
[ 52%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/onnxruntime_providers.dir/code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc.o /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc: In instantiation of 'onnxruntime::common::Status onnxruntime::OneHotOp<in_type, out_type, depth_type>::Compute(onnxruntime::OpKernelContext*) const [with in_type = long long int; out_type = int; depth_type = float]': /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:158:1: required from here /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:137:90: error: narrowing conversion of 'prefix_dim_size' from 'int64_t {aka long long int}' to 'int' inside { } [-Werror=narrowing] Eigen::array<Eigen::DenseIndex, 2> indices_dims_e = {{prefix_dim_size, suffix_dim_size}}; ^ /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:137:90: error: narrowing conversion of '(int64_t)suffix_dim_size' from 'int64_t {aka long long int}' to 'int' inside { } [-Werror=narrowing] /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:143ðŸ’¯ error: narrowing conversion of 'prefix_dim_size' from 'int64_t {aka long long int}' to 'int' inside { } [-Werror=narrowing] Eigen::array<Eigen::DenseIndex, 3> output_dims_e = {{prefix_dim_size, depth_val, suffix_dim_size}}; ^ /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:143ðŸ’¯ error: narrowing conversion of '(int64_t)depth_val' from 'int64_t {aka long long int}' to 'int' inside { } [-Werror=narrowing] /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:143ðŸ’¯ error: narrowing conversion of '(int64_t)suffix_dim_size' from 'int64_t {aka long long int}' to 'int' inside { } [-Werror=narrowing] /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc: In instantiation of 'onnxruntime::common::Status onnxruntime::OneHotOp<in_type, out_type, depth_type>::Compute(onnxruntime::OpKernelContext*) const [with in_type = float; out_type = float; depth_type = float]': /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:158:1: required from here /code/onnxruntime/onnxruntime/core/providers/cpu/tensor/onehot.cc:137:90: error: narrowing conversion of 'prefix_dim_size' from 'int64_t {aka long long int}' to 'int' inside { } [-Werror=narrowing] Eigen::array<Eigen::DenseIndex, 2> indices_dims_e = {{prefix_dim_size, suffix_dim_size}};
